payload: Global codebase audit initiated: dead code, error, and incoherence detection using TaskList orchestration
Global codebase audit initiated: dead code, error, and incoherence detection using TaskList orchestration
Global codebase audit complete: 15 issues identified, 7 critical/major fixes applied. Full report in AUDIT_REPORT.md

AUDIT_REPORT.md: 15 issues identified across dead code (6), errors (2), and incoherence (7). Critical fixes applied: deprecated hooks.json removed, invalid JSON files removed, missing .mcp.json created, orphaned scripts archived. All critical and major issues resolved.
Audit completed: 8 of 15 issues resolved (53%). All critical issues fixed. Remaining: SKILL.md line count violations (2 files), legacy command references. AUDIT_REPORT.md updated with progress.
